• {{hero.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HeroService } from '../hero.service'; import { Hero } from '../heroes/hero'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-bar', templateUrl: './search-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-bar.component.css'] }) export class SearchBarComponent { suggestedHeroes: Hero[] = []; key? : string; constructor(private heroService:HeroService ){} ngOnInit(): void { } sendData(event: any){ const key = event.target.value; const suggestedHeroes = this.heroService.getSuggestedHeroes(key) .subscribe(suggestedHeroes => this.suggestedHeroes= suggestedHeroes ); return suggestedHeroes; } }
